attributes.action: Take legal action against Theresa May for destructive military strikes on Syria
attributes.background: Recent and illegal events have taken place under the command of Theresa May.The British Prime Minister approved hostile destructive actions against Syria without no clear evidence nor with the backing of United Nations Security Council (UNSC). This outcome is completely unacceptable and intolerant.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that accuse someone of committing a crime. 

The House of Commons debated Parliament’s rights in relation to the approval of military action by British Forces overseas on 17 April. You can read the debate here: 

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-04-17/debates/EF164C0A-E0F5-40B6-A718-DD8693A2490C/MilitaryActionOverseasParliamentaryApproval
